---
id: get-payment-by-id
title: "Get Payment by ID"
description: "The **Get Payment by ID** endpoint allows you to retrieve information about a specific payment transaction using its unique identifier. This endpoint provides comprehensive data on the payment, including its status, method, amount, and currency."
sidebar_label: "Get Payment by ID"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: reference/merchant/boomfi-merchants-api
custom_edit_url: null
proxy: https://proxy.writechoice.io/
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Payment by ID"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/payments/{paymentId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The **Get Payment by ID** endpoint allows you to retrieve information about a specific payment transaction using its unique identifier. This endpoint provides comprehensive data on the payment, including its status, method, amount, and currency.        


<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Unique identifier of a payment in the system.","name":"paymentId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
